name: superscription
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
something, especially an address or a name, written on, above, or outside something else: The coin was stamped with the emperor's image and superscription. "This letter will give me news of my son," said Mr McKay, looking at the superscription.
More examplesFewer examplesShe looked at the envelope: no superscription; no stamp, either."Show me a coin," he said. "Whose image and superscription is upon this coin?"
